${modID}:AbyssShriek.NAME: Abyss Shriek
${modID}:AbyssShriek.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spell. Costs !${modID}:S! ${modID}:Soul. NL Deal !D! damage 4 times. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Weak.

${modID}:AcidArmor.NAME: Acid Armor
${modID}:AcidArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak.

${modID}:AcidSplash.NAME: Acid Splash
${modID}:AcidSplash.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL If the enemy has Block, remove it and gain 2 ${modID}:Soul.

${modID}:Backstep.NAME: Backstep
${modID}:Backstep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

${modID}:Bench.NAME: Bench [DEPRECIATED]
${modID}:Bench.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a random ${modID}:Charm into your draw pile. It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BlightedSlash.NAME: Blighted Slash
${modID}:BlightedSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you or the enemy has ${modID}:Infection, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:BluntStrike.NAME: Blunt Strike
${modID}:BluntStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This card deals triple damage to enemies with Block or Weak.

${modID}:ChanneledBeam.NAME: Channeled Beam
${modID}:ChanneledBeam.DESCRIPTION: Remove all your ${modID}:Infection. NL Apply lost ${modID}:Infection to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ConjureShield.NAME: Conjure Shield
${modID}:ConjureShield.DESCRIPTION: Costs !${modID}:S! ${modID}:Soul. Gain !B! Block. NL If you do not have ${modID}:Soul, gain !M! ${modID}:Soul instead.

${modID}:CorruptedNail.NAME: Corrupted Nail
${modID}:CorruptedNail.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply !M! ${modID}:Infection.

${modID}:DashSlash.NAME: Dash Slash
${modID}:DashSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Next turn, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:DeepFocus.NAME: Deep Focus
${modID}:DeepFocus.DESCRIPTION: Costs !${modID}:S! ${modID}:Soul. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DescendingDark.NAME: Descending Dark
${modID}:DescendingDark.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spell. Costs !${modID}:S! ${modID}:Soul. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain block equal to the number of cards in your exhaust pile.

${modID}:DesolateDive.NAME: Desolate Dive
${modID}:DesolateDive.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spell. Costs !${modID}:S! ${modID}:Soul. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !B! Block.

${modID}:DreamNoMore.NAME: Dream No More
${modID}:DreamNoMore.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Status or Curse card, make it Ethereal and draw !M! card. NL If it is a *Void, gain [E].

${modID}:EmanatingGlow.NAME: Emanating Glow
${modID}:EmanatingGlow.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! ${modID}:Infection to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Empower.NAME: Empower
${modID}:Empower.DESCRIPTION: Costs ALL ${modID}:Soul. NL Gain 2 Strength and 2 Dexterity for every 3 ${modID}:Soul lost. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Feint.NAME: Feint
${modID}:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, NL gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Focus.NAME: Focus
${modID}:Focus.DESCRIPTION: Costs !${modID}:S! ${modID}:Soul. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Focus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Costs !${modID}:S! ${modID}:Soul. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FollowUpStrike.NAME: Follow-Up Strike
${modID}:FollowUpStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the last card you used in this combat is a ${modID}:Spell, gain !M! ${modID}:Soul and draw !M! card.

${modID}:FrenziedSlash.NAME: Frenzied Slash
${modID}:FrenziedSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of your turn, lose !M! Strength.

${modID}:HowlingWraiths.NAME: Howling Wraiths
${modID}:HowlingWraiths.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spell. Costs !${modID}:S! ${modID}:Soul. NL Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Weak.

${modID}:InfectedWall.NAME: Infected Wall
${modID}:InfectedWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain Block equal to your current ${modID}:Infection. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:InfectionOutbreak.NAME: Infection Outbreak
${modID}:InfectionOutbreak.DESCRIPTION: Gain 6 ${modID}:Infection. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Infection to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:LightOfRuin.NAME: Light of Ruin
${modID}:LightOfRuin.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spell. Costs !${modID}:S! ${modID}:Soul. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Infection.

${modID}:LightOrb.NAME: Light Orb
${modID}:LightOrb.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spell. Costs !${modID}:S! ${modID}:Soul. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If Exhausted, permanently increase this card's damage by !M!. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MantisTraining.NAME: Mantis Training
${modID}:MantisTraining.DESCRIPTION: ALL your cards containing "Strike" or "Slash" deal !M! additional damage.

${modID}:Mapping.NAME: Mapping
${modID}:Mapping.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card.
${modID}:Mapping.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional cards.

${modID}:NailmastersGlory.NAME: Nailmaster's Glory [DEPRECIATED]
${modID}:NailmastersGlory.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Charm. NL Increases attack damage of "Slash" cards by 4 and they cost 1 less [E].

${modID}:NoWillToBreak.NAME: No Will to Break
${modID}:NoWillToBreak.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a copy of this card into your NL discard pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Quickcast.NAME: Quickcast
${modID}:Quickcast.DESCRIPTION: This combat, your next ${modID}:Spell is played twice. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Quickcast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This combat, your next ${modID}:Spell is played twice.

${modID}:QuickFocus.NAME: Quick Focus
${modID}:QuickFocus.DESCRIPTION: Costs !${modID}:S! ${modID}:Soul. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:NailParry.NAME: Nail Parry
${modID}:NailParry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:PogoStrike.NAME: Pogo Strike
${modID}:PogoStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Discard 1 card.

${modID}:Purify.NAME: Purify [DEPRECIATED]
${modID}:Purify.DESCRIPTION: Costs !${modID}:S! ${modID}:Soul. NL Lower your ${modID}:Infection by !M!. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Purify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Costs !${modID}:S! ${modID}:Soul. NL Lower your ${modID}:Infection by !M!. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RadianceImplosion.NAME: Radiance Implosion
${modID}:RadianceImplosion.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to X times the target's ${modID}:Infection to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:RadianceImplosion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to X+1 times the target's ${modID}:Infection to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RadiantBurst.NAME: Radiant Burst
${modID}:RadiantBurst.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 ${modID}:Infection. NL ALL enemies gain !M! ${modID}:Infection and 2 Weak. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Reconstruct.NAME: Reconstruct
${modID}:Reconstruct.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of a card in your exhaust pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Rejuvenate.NAME: Rejuvenate
${modID}:Rejuvenate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Soul. NL Draw 3 cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ShadeDash.NAME: Shade Dash
${modID}:ShadeDash.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your Exhaust pile.

${modID}:ShadeSoul.NAME: Shade Soul
${modID}:ShadeSoul.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spell. Costs !${modID}:S! ${modID}:Soul. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:SharpShadow.NAME: Sharp Shadow
${modID}:SharpShadow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E]. NL Add a *Void into your discard pile.

${modID}:Spark.NAME: Spark [DEPRECIATED]
${modID}:Spark.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose HP equal to their ${modID}:Infection stacks. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SpectralFocus.NAME: Spectral Focus
${modID}:SpectralFocus.DESCRIPTION: Costs !${modID}:S! ${modID}:Soul. NL Exhaust !M! cards. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SpectralFocus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Costs !${modID}:S! ${modID}:Soul. NL Exhaust !M! cards. NL Gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:SpikeWall.NAME: Spike Wall
${modID}:SpikeWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

${modID}:SpiritBarrage.NAME: Spirit Barrage
${modID}:SpiritBarrage.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spell. Costs ALL ${modID}:Soul. NL Deal !D! damage for each ${modID}:Soul lost. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Swift.NAME: Swift
${modID}:Swift.DESCRIPTION: Add Ethereal to 1 card in your hand. NL Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:SoulAura.NAME: Soul Aura
${modID}:SoulAura.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for every ${modID}:Spell played in this combat. NL Gain !B! Block.

${modID}:SoulAbsorption.NAME: Soul Absorption
${modID}:SoulAbsorption.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, NL gain !M! ${modID}:Soul.

${modID}:SoulBlade.NAME: Soul Blade
${modID}:SoulBlade.DESCRIPTION: Costs !${modID}:S! ${modID}:Soul. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! additional damage for every ${modID}:Soul you have.

${modID}:SoulBoomerang.NAME: Soul Boomerang
${modID}:SoulBoomerang.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Spell. Costs !${modID}:S! ${modID}:Soul. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

${modID}:SoulReaper.NAME: Soul Reaper
${modID}:SoulReaper.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Soul for each enemy in combat.

${modID}:SoulShield.NAME: Soul Shield
${modID}:SoulShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for every ${modID}:Soul you hold.

${modID}:SpellMastery.NAME: Spell Mastery
${modID}:SpellMastery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a ${modID}:Spell, increase the damage of your next ${modID}:Spell by !M!%.

${modID}:VesselFragment.NAME: Vessel Fragment
${modID}:VesselFragment.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! maximum ${modID}:Soul capacity for this combat.

${modID}:VoidClaw.NAME: Void Claw
${modID}:VoidClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add Ethereal to 1 random card.
${modID}:VoidClaw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add Ethereal to 1 card.

${modID}:VoidEmbrace.NAME: Void Embrace
${modID}:VoidEmbrace.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Ethereal card Exhausts, NL draw !M! card.

${modID}:VoidForm.NAME: Void Form
${modID}:VoidForm.DESCRIPTION: ALL your attacks become NL Ethereal and cost 0 ${modID}:Soul NL when drawn. NL At the end of your turn, NL lose 2 ${modID}:Soul.

${modID}:VoidUnity.NAME: Void Unity
${modID}:VoidUnity.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, play ALL Ethereal cards in your hand and exhaust them.

${modID}:VoidLash.NAME: Void Lash
${modID}:VoidLash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Weak, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:VoidShackles.NAME: Void Shackles
${modID}:VoidShackles.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:VoidShackles.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Enemy loses 2 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:VoidShield.NAME: Void Shield
${modID}:VoidShield.DESCRIPTION: Add Ethereal to ALL non-Attack cards in your hand. NL Gain !B! Block for each Ethereal card in your hand.

${modID}:VoidTendrils.NAME: Void Tendrils
${modID}:VoidTendrils.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle a *Void into your discard pile.

${modID}:WaywardCompass.NAME: Wayward Compass [DEPRECIATED]
${modID}:WaywardCompass.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Charm. NL At the start of your turn, draw 2 additional cards.

${modID}:WellPrepared.NAME: Well Prepared
${modID}:WellPrepared.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The next ${modID}:Soul cost is free.

${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.
